name: .ICE File Extension
summary: Learn about .ICE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ICE file is a compressed archive created by ICEOWS, formerly known as ArjFolder. It contains one or more files that have been compressed and packaged together. Often, ICE files contain compressed text files.

content: Interface de Compression Ergonomique pour windOWS, or ICEOWS, is an archive utility that allows users to package files in compressed archives. These archives are saved as .ARJ, .ZIP, or ICE files.

ICE compression is designed specifically for use with text files. Therefore, ICE archives often contain multiple related text files, which have been packaged together for easier storage and distribution.

instructions: You can open an ICE file with ICEOWS (Windows) or ESTsoft ALZip (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
